analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/28/0xab352f6143e06871ba85a35a105d53d0b8ff2cf9.sol:

	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/28/0xab352f6143e06871ba85a35a105d53d0b8ff2cf9.sol#421-422)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

_RowanCoin._MINIMUM_TARGET should be constant (/unique_chucks/28/0xab352f6143e06871ba85a35a105d53d0b8ff2cf9.sol#158-159)
